--- title: "GHG emissions" format: html --- ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-6} **Name:** GHG emissions **Source:** [EDGAR](https://edgar.jrc.ec.europa.eu/dataset_ghg2025) **Version:** EDGAR_2025_GHG **Keywords:** climate change, mitigation, emissions, CO2, CH4, N2O **Type:** Raster **Description:** EDGAR_2025_GHG provides emissions of the three main greenhouse gases (CO2, CH4, N2O) and fluorinated gases per sector and country. Annual time series (1970-2024) and emission gridmaps (0.1 deg) are provided by sector, as well as monthly data for the last available year. **Units:** NA **Available in geocoded GMD?** NA **Available from Space2Stats?** NA ::: ::: {.g-col-6} **Map** ::: {.cell} ::: **Coordinate reference system:** NA **Spatial coverage:** Global **Spatial resolution:** NA **Temporal coverage:** NA **Temporal resolution:** NA **License:** NA **Citation:** Crippa, M., Guizzardi, D., Pagani, F., Banja, M., Muntean, M. et al., GHG emissions of all world countries - 2025 Report, Publications Office of the European Union, Luxembourg, 2025, doi:10.2760/9816914, JRC143227. ::: ::: ::::::: grid ::: {.g-col-lg-8 .g-col-lg-offset-2 .g-col-md-10 .g-col-md-offset-1 .g-col-sm-12 .g-col-12} **Usage:** NA **Limitations:** NA **Examples:** NA **Access:** NA ::: panel-tabset ## R No code ## Output ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "None" ``` ::: ::: ::: **Last updated:** NA ::: ::::::: ```{=html}
